attributes.additional_details: Animals are petrified and even dying, our soldiers who have served our country feel they have to take cover when they hear the bangs! Why can’t noisy fireworks be banned and only silent ones be sold
attributes.background: Stop fireworks that bang, silent fireworks can be bought and would work as well! Think about animals, elderly people, our soldiers with PTSD!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make fireworks quieter: Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590838

Ban use and sale of non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599451
